verses.plain: Instead of a friend become not an enemy; for thereby thou shalt inherit an ill name, shame, and reproach: even so shall a sinner that hath a double tongue.

tokens.t: Instead of a friend become not an enemy; for
thou shalt inherit an ill name, shame, and reproach: even so shall a sinner that hath a double tongue.

verses.plain: Extol not thyself in the counsel of thine own heart; that thy soul be not torn in pieces as a bull straying alone.

tokens.t: Extol not thyself in the counsel of thine own heart; that thy soul be not torn in pieces as a bull

verses.plain: Thou shalt eat up thy leaves, and lose thy fruit, and leave thyself as a dry tree.

tokens.t: Thou shalt eat up thy leaves, and lose thy fruit, and leave thyself as a dry tree.

verses.plain: A wicked soul shall destroy him that hath it, and shall make him to be laughed to scorn of his enemies.

tokens.t: A wicked soul shall destroy him that hath it, and shall make him to be laughed to scorn of his enemies.

verses.plain: Sweet language will multiply friends: and a fairspeaking tongue will increase kind greetings.

tokens.t: Sweet language will multiply friends: and a fairspeaking tongue will increase kind greetings.

verses.plain: Be in peace with many: nevertheless have but one counsellor of a thousand.

tokens.t: Be in peace with many: nevertheless have but one counsellor of a thousand.

verses.plain: If thou wouldest get a friend, prove him first and be not hasty to credit him.

tokens.t: If thou wouldest get a friend, prove him first and be not hasty to credit him.

verses.plain: For some man is a friend for his own occasion, and will not abide in the day of thy trouble.

tokens.t: For some man is a friend for his own occasion, and will not abide in the day of thy trouble.

verses.plain: And there is a friend, who being turned to enmity, and strife will discover thy reproach.

tokens.t: And there is a friend, who being turned to enmity, and strife will discover thy reproach.

verses.plain: Again, some friend is a companion at the table, and will not continue in the day of thy affliction.

tokens.t: Again, some friend is a companion at the table, and will not continue in the day of thy affliction.

verses.plain: But in thy prosperity he will be as thyself, and will be bold over thy servants.

tokens.t: But in thy prosperity he will be as thyself, and will be bold over thy servants.

verses.plain: If thou be brought low, he will be against thee, and will hide himself from thy face.

tokens.t: If thou be brought low, he will be against thee, and will hide himself from thy face.

verses.plain: Separate thyself from thine enemies, and take heed of thy friends.

tokens.t: Separate thyself from thine enemies, and take heed of thy friends.

verses.plain: A faithfull friend is a strong defence: and he that hath found such an one hath found a treasure.

tokens.t: A faithfull friend is a strong defence: and he that hath found such an one hath found a treasure.

verses.plain: Nothing doth countervail a faithful friend, and his excellency is invaluable.

tokens.t: Nothing doth countervail a faithful friend, and his excellency is invaluable.

verses.plain: A faithful friend is the medicine of life; and they that fear the Lord shall find him.

tokens.t: A faithful friend is the medicine of life; and they that fear the Lord shall find him.

verses.plain: Whoso feareth the Lord shall direct his friendship aright: for as he is, so shall his neighbour be also.

tokens.t: Whoso feareth the Lord shall direct his friendship aright: for as he is, so shall his neighbour be also.

verses.plain: My son, gather instruction from thy youth up: so shalt thou find wisdom till thine old age.

tokens.t: My son, gather instruction from thy youth up: so shalt thou find wisdom till thine old age.

verses.plain: Come unto her as one that ploweth and soweth, and wait for her good fruits: for thou shalt not toil much in labouring about her, but thou shalt eat of her fruits right soon.

tokens.t: Come unto her as one that ploweth and soweth, and wait for her good fruits: for thou shalt not toil much in labouring about her, but thou shalt eat of her fruits right soon.

verses.plain: She is very unpleasant to the unlearned: he that is without understanding will not remain with her.

tokens.t: She is very unpleasant to the unlearned: he that is without understanding will not remain with her.

verses.plain: She will lie upon him as a mighty stone of trial; and he will cast her from him ere it be long.

tokens.t: She will lie upon him as a mighty stone of trial; and he will cast her from him ere it be long.

verses.plain: For wisdom is according to her name, and she is not manifest unto many.

tokens.t: For wisdom is according to her name, and she is not manifest unto many.

verses.plain: Give ear, my son, receive my advice, and refuse not my counsel,

tokens.t: Give ear, my son, receive my advice, and refuse not my counsel,

verses.plain: And put thy feet into her fetters, and thy neck into her chain.

tokens.t: And put thy feet into her fetters, and thy neck into her chain.

verses.plain: Bow down thy shoulder, and bear her, and be not grieved with her bonds.

tokens.t: Bow down thy shoulder, and bear her, and be not grieved with her bonds.

verses.plain: Come unto her with thy whole heart, and keep her ways with all thy power.

tokens.t: Come unto her with thy whole heart, and keep her ways with all thy power.

verses.plain: Search, and seek, and she shall be made known unto thee: and when thou hast got hold of her, let her not go.

tokens.t: Search, and seek, and she shall be made known unto thee: and when thou hast got hold of her, let her not go.

verses.plain: For at the last thou shalt find her rest, and that shall be turned to thy joy.

tokens.t: For at the last thou shalt find her rest, and that shall be turned to thy joy.

verses.plain: Then shall her fetters be a strong defence for thee, and her chains a robe of glory.

tokens.t: Then shall her fetters be a strong defence for thee, and her chains a robe of glory.

verses.plain: For there is a golden ornament upon her, and her bands are purple lace.

tokens.t: For there is a golden ornament upon her, and her bands are purple lace.

verses.plain: Thou shalt put her on as a robe of honour, and shalt put her about thee as a crown of joy.

tokens.t: Thou shalt put her on as a robe of honour, and shalt put her about thee as a crown of joy.

verses.plain: My son, if thou wilt, thou shalt be taught: and if thou wilt apply thy mind, thou shalt be prudent.

tokens.t: My son, if thou wilt, thou shalt be taught: and if thou wilt apply thy mind, thou shalt be prudent.

verses.plain: If thou love to hear, thou shalt receive understanding: and if thou bow thine ear, thou shalt be wise,

tokens.t: If thou love to hear, thou shalt receive understanding: and if thou bow thine ear, thou shalt be wise,

verses.plain: Stand in the multitude of the elders; and cleave unto him that is wise.

tokens.t: Stand in the multitude of the elders; and cleave unto him that is wise.

verses.plain: Be willing to hear every godly discourse; and let not the parables of understanding escape thee.

tokens.t: Be willing to hear every godly discourse; and let not the parables of understanding escape thee.

verses.plain: And if thou seest a man of understanding, get thee betimes unto him, and let thy foot wear the steps of his door.

tokens.t: And if thou seest a man of understanding, get thee betimes unto him, and let thy foot wear the steps of his door.

verses.plain: Let thy mind be upon the ordinances of the Lord and meditate continually in his commandments: he shall establish thine heart, and give thee wisdom at thine owns desire.

tokens.t: Let thy mind be upon the ordinances of the Lord and meditate continually in his commandments: he shall establish thine heart, and give thee wisdom at thine owns desire.
